trans-unit.source: An abstract WCF extension class for specifying a custom discovery service or for getting the published endpoints.
trans-unit.target: WCF extensão classe abstracta para especificar um serviço de deteção personalizadas ou para obter os pontos finais publicados.

trans-unit.source: Derive a class from DiscoveryServiceExtension and override the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A> method to return your custom discovery service.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe de derivar de DiscoveryServiceExtension e ignorar o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A>método para devolver o seu serviço de deteção personalizada.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A>

trans-unit.source: Add your derived class to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> extensions that host your discoverable service.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar a sua classe derivada para a <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>extensões que alojam o serviço detetável.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IServiceBehavior%23Validate%2A> is called the behavior iterates through the extensions in the service host and looks for a DiscoveryServiceExtension.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IServiceBehavior%23Validate%2A>denomina-se o comportamento itera através de extensões no anfitrião de serviço e procura uma DiscoveryServiceExtension.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IServiceBehavior%23Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If one is found its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A> is called to get the custom discovery service.
trans-unit.target: Se não for encontrado um respetivo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A>denomina-se para obter o serviço de deteção personalizada.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an extension is not found the default discovery service implementation is used.
trans-unit.target: Se não for encontrada uma extensão que a implementação de serviço de deteção predefinida é utilizada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Override this method to return your custom <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryService"></xref> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este método para devolver o personalizado de substituição <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryService"> </xref> implementação.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown while opening the service host if this method returns `null`
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>é acionada ao abrir o anfitrião do serviço se este método devolve `null` </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>
Uma implementação de serviço de deteção personalizada.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of published endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção só de leitura de pontos finais publicadas.

trans-unit.source: The property should be accessed only after the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> has successfully opened.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade deve ser acedida apenas após a <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>foi aberto com êxito.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> is in <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata> is being generated and added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>está a ser <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado, o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata>está a ser gerados e adicionados à coleção.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of published endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de pontos finais publicados só de leitura.
